categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic planets

nodes.text: Tierfon was a planet in the Mid Rim that was considered a Rebel Alliance starfighter hub that was at least a level five during the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire. Tierfon was included in a map of the galaxy that listed safe worlds, starfighter hubs at level five or higher, regional headquarters and operations sectors, and deep space caches. The map was later included in The Rebel Files

Tierfon was home to the Tierfon Launch Base, headquarters of the Tierfon Yellow Ace Chase Squadron and home to around a hundred rebel pilots until nearby Imperial military forces caught scent of their exploits and forced the scuttling of the base.
